page.title: 07Events CARSHALTON, Surrey.
page.content: In June I went to Carshalton Carnival In fact I was in it, I was a May Queen on the Beddington May Queen float. We started off at St. Helier hospital and later we stopped because they were going to give the best May Queen card. Our float was a swan and we were sitting inside it. We were the best May Queen float so we got the card. Then we went to Queen Mary's Childrens' Hospital and threw sweets to the children. After that we went to Carshalton Park and we had to wait nearly an hour for the prize giving. We won a great big silver cup. Charlotte Earp (Age 9)
